name: Ambidextrous (Nee_XOR)
description:
Developed for GGJ 22. Theme: Duality.

Main character is ambidextrous, fighting evil monsters with dual swords. Spirit of the girl came from another world to help him. You will be controlling both with both of your hands.

Idea, Art: Yuliia Sokolovska https://www.behance.net/sokolovska

Game Design, Programming: Nykyta Yevdokymenko https://twitter.com/nee_xor
